raw.description: Add raw bayer data to jpeg metadata

output.description: Output filename <filename> (to write to stdout, use '-o -'). If not specified, no file is saved

latest.description: Link latest complete image to filename <filename>

timeout.description: Time (in ms) before takes picture and shuts down (if not specified, set to 5s)

demo.description: Run a demo mode (cycle through range of camera options, no capture)

encoding.description: Encoding to use for output file (jpg, bmp, gif, png)

exif.description: EXIF tag to apply to captures (format as 'key=value') or none

timelapse.description: Timelapse mode. Takes a picture every <t>ms

fullpreview.description: Run the preview using the still capture resolution (may reduce preview fps)

keypress.description: Wait between captures for a ENTER, X then ENTER to exit

signal.description: Wait between captures for a SIGUSR1 from another process

gl.description: Draw preview to texture instead of using video render component

glcapture.description: Capture the GL frame-buffer instead of the camera image

settings.description: Retrieve camera settings and write to stdout

mode.description: Force sensor mode. 0=auto. See docs for other modes available

nopreview.description: Do not display a preview window

roi.description: Set region of interest (x,y,w,d as normalised coordinates [0.0-1.0])

awbgains.description: Set AWB gains - AWB mode must be off

stats.description: Force recomputation of statistics on stills capture pass
